CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Rusty Kettle relative to Emerald Diner?
SRP.A: The Rusty Kettle is {above} Emerald Diner in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Plate relative to Sky High Cafe?
SRP.A: Crimson Plate is {below} Sky High Cafe in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Plate relative to The Golden Spoon?
SRP.A: Crimson Plate is {above} The Golden Spoon in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total food cost percentage?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Stellar Bistro}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total food cost percentage?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Sky High Cafe}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is The Golden Spoon's maximum Food Cost Percentage in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: The Golden Spoon's maximum Food Cost Percentage is in {1975}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Sky High Cafe's maximum Food Cost Percentage in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Sky High Cafe's maximum Food Cost Percentage is in {1975}.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Cost Percentage in 1985 higher or lower than in 1986?
NC.A: The total food cost percentage in 1985 was {lower} than in 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1992, was the average total Food Cost Percentage higher or lower than between 1979 and 1988?
NC.A: The average total food cost percentage between 1991 and 1992 was {higher} than between 1979 and 1988.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1985, was the average total Food Cost Percentage higher or lower than between 1979 and 1983?
NC.A: The average total food cost percentage between 1983 and 1985 was {higher} than between 1979 and 1983.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Cost Percentage in 1977 higher or lower than in 1979?
NC.A: The total food cost percentage in 1977 was {higher} than in 1979.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Stellar Bistro} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did The Rusty Kettle and Emerald Diner first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: The Rusty Kettle and Emerald Diner first exchanged leading positions in {1976}.
